verses.verse: Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>age;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>way.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H2205>oldest<s%> of his <S%H1004>household,<s%> who <S%H4910>had<s%> <S%H4910>charge<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he owned, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7760>place<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H3409>thigh,<s%>

and I will make you <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H776>earth,<s%> that you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H3427>live,<s%>
but you shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to my <S%H776>country<s%> and to my <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> "

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H194>"Suppose<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> should I <S%H7725>take<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H3318>came<s%>?"
Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H8104>"Beware<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7725>take<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H8033>there!<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> me from my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H4138>birth,<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, and <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'To your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%>' He will <S%H7971>send<s%> His <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you will <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H8033>there.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> is not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> you, then you will be <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> my <S%H7621>oath;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> do not <S%H7725>take<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>"

So the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7760>placed<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3409>thigh<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

Then the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> from the <S%H1581>camels<s%> of his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H1980>set<s%> out with a <S%H3605>variety<s%> of <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2898>things<s%> of his master's in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

And he made the <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1288>kneel<s%> <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> by the <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> when women <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H7579>water.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H7136>grant<s%> me <S%H7136>success<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5324>standing<s%> by the <S%H9407>spring,<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> are <S%H3318>coming<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%>

now may it be that the <S%H5291>girl<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4994>'Please<s%> <S%H5186>let<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H3537>jar<s%> so that I may <S%H8354>drink,<s%>' and who <S%H559>answers,<s%> <S%H8354>'Drink,<s%> and I will <S%H8248>water<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>'; â€“ [may] she [be the one] whom Thou hast <S%H3198>appointed<s%> for Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and by this I shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou hast <S%H6213>shown<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to my <S%H113>master.<s%> "

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H2962>before<s%> he had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of Abraham's <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out with her <S%H3537>jar<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

And the <S%H5291>girl<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>beautiful,<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> had <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H3045>relations<s%> with her; and she <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H9407>spring<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> her <S%H3537>jar,<s%> and <S%H5927>came<s%> up.

Then the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let me <S%H1572>drink<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from your <S%H3537>jar.<s%>"

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>"Drink,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%>"; and she <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H3381>lowered<s%> her <S%H3537>jar<s%> to her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H8248>gave<s%> him a <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

Now when she had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H8248>giving<s%> him a <S%H8248>drink,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> for your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H518><s%> they have <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H8354>drinking.<s%>"

So she <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H6168>emptied<s%> her <S%H3537>jar<s%> into the <S%H8268>trough,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H5750>back<s%> to the <S%H875>well<s%> to <S%H7579>draw,<s%> and she <S%H7579>drew<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

Meanwhile, the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H7583>gazing<s%> at her in <S%H2790>silence,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6743>made<s%> his <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>successful<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not.

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H9201>when<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>ring<s%> <S%H4948>weighing<s%> a half-shekel and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> for her <S%H3027>wrists<s%> <S%H4948>weighing<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels in <S%H2091>gold,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are you? <S%H4994>Please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H4725>room<s%> for us to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in your father's <S%H1004>house<s%>?"
And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>"
Again she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%H7227>plenty<s%> of <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>feed,<s%> and <S%H4725>room<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in."
Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>low<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and His <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H5973><s%> my <S%H113>master;<s%> as for me, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5148>guided<s%> me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my master's <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"
Then the <S%H5291>girl<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her mother's <S%H1004>household<s%> about <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

Now <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> had a <S%H251>brother<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3837>Laban;<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> at the <S%H9407>spring.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5141>ring,<s%> and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H3027>wrists,<s%> and when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his sister, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"This<s%> is <S%H3541>what<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to me," he <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H376>man;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H1581>camels<s%> at the <S%H9407>spring.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> in, <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> since I have <S%H6437>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels<s%>?"

So the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%> Then Laban <S%H6605>unloaded<s%> the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>feed<s%> to the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him.

But when [food] was <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him to <S%H398>eat,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H1696>told<s%> my <S%H1697>business.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> on."
So he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am Abraham's <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> so that he has <S%H1431>become<s%> <S%H1431>rich;<s%> and He has <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>maids,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>

"Now <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my master in her <S%H2209>old<s%> <S%H2209>age;<s%> and he has <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has.

"And my <S%H113>master<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> I <S%H3427>live;<s%>
but you shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to my father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> and to my <S%H4940>relatives,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son.<s%>'
"And I <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H194>'Suppose<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> does not <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me.'

"And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1980>walked,<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> His <S%H4397>angel<s%> with you to make your <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>successful,<s%> and you will <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> from my <S%H4940>relatives,<s%> and from my father's <S%H1004>house;<s%>

<S%H227>then<s%> you will be <S%H5352>free<s%> from my <S%H423>oath,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H4940>relatives;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> they do not <S%H5414>give<s%> her to you, you will be <S%H9345>free<s%> from my <S%H423>oath.<s%>'

"So I <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to the <S%H9407>spring,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> Thou wilt make my <S%H1870>journey<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6743>successful;<s%>

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H5324>standing<s%> by the <S%H9407>spring,<s%> and may it be that the <S%H5959>maiden<s%> who <S%H3318>comes<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw,<s%> and to whom I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let me <S%H8248>drink<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from your <S%H3537>jar<s%>";

and she will <S%H559>say<s%> to me, "You <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and I will <S%H7579>draw<s%> for your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>"; let her be the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3198>appointed<s%> for my master's <S%H1121>son.<s%> '

<S%H2962>"Before<s%> I had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out with her <S%H3537>jar<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H9407>spring<s%> and <S%H7579>drew;<s%> and I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4994>'Please<s%> let me <S%H8248>drink.<s%>'

"And she <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H3381>lowered<s%> her <S%H3537>jar<s%> from her [shoulder,] and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>'Drink,<s%> and I will <S%H8248>water<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>'; so I <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and she <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

"Then I <S%H7592>asked<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>'Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are you?' And she <S%H559>said,<s%> 'The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> Nahor's <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him'; and I <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5141>ring<s%> on her <S%H639>nose,<s%> and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on her <S%H3027>wrists.<s%>

"And I <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>low<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H5148>guided<s%> me in the <S%H571>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my master's <S%H251>kinsman<s%> for his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
